tiles.title: A cabin in the wilderness
tiles.text: Such a crispy night. The sky is full of twinkling start, and a cold breeze caresses your skin. A fire in the chimney, makes the small cabin warm. The cabin is a small room, with a box on the right.

items.name: Whiskey
items.messageAfterUse: Yeek.. Yeek.. the whiskey is so strong and warms your body.

tiles.title: In a cabin bed
tiles.text: Wow, such a warm place. The mattress's not very comfortable, but I'm happy with it.'

tiles.title: The forest
tiles.text: You're in the wilderness. Just the soft sound of your feet in the white snow.
